textBox.richText: We will present 4 papers at the upcoming International Joint Conference on Biometrics on Oct. 11-13, 2011 (IJCB 2011): ”Counter-Measures to Photo Attacks in Face Recognition: a public database and a baseline”, André Anjos and Sébastien Marcel “Inter-session Variability Modelling and Joint Factor Analysis for Face Authentication”, Roy Wallace, Mitchell McLaren, Christopher McCool and Sébastien Marcel “Fast Speaker Verification on Mobile Phone data using Boosted Slice Classifiers”, Anindya Roy, Magimai Doss Mathew and Sébastien Marcel “Competition on Counter Measures to 2-D Facial Spoofing Attacks”, Murali Chakka, André Anjos, Sébastien Marcel and al. See you in Washington DC !
